oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The First Secessionist" envelope featuring the Devil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Envelope printed by Mumford and Company from the Clerk's Office of the District Court of the U. S. for the Southern District of Ohio. Features an image of the Devil under which the text "the First Secessionist" is printed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
